QuestData.Title: Don't Forget the Horde
QuestData.Description: Evenar and the other apprentices may not be much use in a battle, but you look like you can more than hold your own. The Horde scum across the road to the east at Bathran's Haunt need to be taught a lesson.$B$BTheir new warlord, Garrosh Hellscream, has them up to no good. Feel like teaching them a thing or two?$B$BI'd come with you, but my assignment is to stay here and protect Orendil's apprentices, and that's exactly what I'm going to do.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill any 10 Horde at Bathran's Haunt.
QuestData.RewardText: <The sentinel eyes you appreciatively for a moment.>$B$BA job well done, $c. If you're any indication of the quality of the $r adventurers we're going to be seeing more of, we should have this war against the orcs and their Horde taken care of faster than expected.
